mapper.select: select emp_no, emp_pw, EMP_NM, EMP_RRNO1, EMP_RRNO2, EMP_TELNO, EMP_ZIP, EMP_ADRES1, EMP_ADRES2, EMP_EMAIL, EMP_SEXDSTN, EMP_BRTHDY, EMP_DEP, EMP_ENCPN, EMP_RETIRE, EMP_EXP, EMP_RGSDE, EMP_UPDDE, EMP_HFFC_AT, EMP_PROFILE, EMP_SIGN, EMP_LCNS, EMP_DOCTR_LCNS, EMP_SE, EMP_AUTHOR, EMP_CLSF, EMP_YRYC_USE, EMP_YRYC_REMNDR, EMP_OFFHOD_USE, EMP_OFFHOD_REMNDR, EMP_CONFM, RJCT_RESN, EMP_RQSTR from employee where EMP_HFFC_AT = 'Y' and EMP_CONFM = 'Y' and EMP_SE = 'n' order by EMP_ENCPN desc
mapper.delete: delete from work_schedule WHERE TO_CHAR(work_de, 'YYYY-MM') = #{thisYm, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select emp_no , COUNT(CASE WHEN WORK_CD='D' THEN 1 END) as empD , COUNT(CASE WHEN WORK_CD='E' THEN 1 END) as empE , COUNT(CASE WHEN WORK_CD='N' THEN 1 END) as empN , COUNT(CASE WHEN WORK_CD='OFF' THEN 1 END) as empOFF FROM WORK_SCHEDULE WHERE TO_CHAR(work_de, 'YYYY-MM') = #{tempDate} group by emp_no order by emp_no asc

SELECT WORK_DE, SUM(CASE WHEN WORK_CD = 'D' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS allD, SUM(CASE WHEN WORK_CD = 'E' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS allE, SUM(CASE WHEN WORK_CD = 'N' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS allN, SUM(CASE WHEN WORK_CD = 'OFF' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS allOFF FROM WORK_SCHEDULE WHERE TO_CHAR(work_de, 'YYYY-MM') = #{tempDate} GROUP BY WORK_DE ORDER BY WORK_DE

SELECT emp_no, MAX(emp_nm) AS empNm, LISTAGG(work_cd, ',') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY work_de) AS workCd FROM WORK_SCHEDULE WHERE TO_CHAR(work_de, 'YYYY-MM') = #{tempDate} GROUP BY emp_no ORDER BY emp_no ASC
